## Solutions
```racket
; problem name: Largest product in a series
; problem link: https://projecteuler.net/problem=8
; contest link: (?)
; time: (?)
; author: reyad


; other_tags: math
; difficulty_level: beginner


#lang racket

; answer: 23514624000

(define char-to-digit
  (lambda (ch)
    (- (char->integer ch) 48)))

(define max-prod-in-series
  (lambda (l limit)
    (cond
      [(null? l)
       0]
      [#t
       (max (let loop [(l l) (c 0)]
              (cond
                [(null? l)
                 0]
                [#t
                 (cond
                   [(= c limit)
                    1]
                   [#t
                    (* (char-to-digit (car l))
                       (loop (cdr l) (add1 c)))])]))
            (max-prod-in-series (cdr l) limit))])))

(define n "")
(define adjacent-digit-limit 13)

(max-prod-in-series (string->list n) adjacent-digit-limit)

```
